title: THREE-YEAR-OLD JUMBO DIES CAUGHT IN RAGING WATERS IN HABARANA
content: The raging waters caused by the incessant rains spared no man nor beast in its path. When nature unleashed it fury across the land, this little pachyderm had little chance of survival. The tiny jumbo got swept away by the raging floods. Whether he breathed his last by drowning or by getting his skull cracked…
